joinmsg.reset_success: Your join message has been reset.
joinmsg.first:
Okay, the message will be sent in ${channel}. Now you'll need to type the message the bot will display.
Don't put the command in the message.
You can use tags :
{user} mentions the user
{username} displays the username of the member
{guild} displays the guild name
joinmsg.second: Okay, this message will be displayed in ${channel} when someone will join your server !
joinmsg.help_description:
Configure the message that will display when a user joins the server

You can use tags :
{user} mentions the user
{username} displays the username of the member
{guild} displays the guild name

leavemsg.reset_success: Your leave message has been reset.
leavemsg.first:
Okay, the message will be sent in ${channel}. Now you'll need to type the message the bot will display.
Don't put the command in the message.
You can use tags :
{username} displays the username of the member
{guild} displays the guild namer
leavemsg.second: Okay, this message will be displayed in ${channel} when someone will leave your server !
leavemsg.help_description:
Configure the message that will display when a user leaves the server

You can use tags :
{username} displays the username of the member
{guild} displays the guild name

ignore.m: Commands are now disabled in these channels :
ignore.s: Commands are now enabled in these channels :
ignore.nochans: Please mention at least one channel.
ignore.madd: For re-enabling commands in disabled channels, just redo the command with mentionning disabled channels.
ignore.sadd: Only members with the permission to manage members will be able to use commands in disabled channels.
ignore.help_description:
Enables or disables command in said channels.

Members with the "MANAGE MEMBERS" permission still can use commands in disabled channels.
ignore.help_usage: am!ignore <#channels> (you can mention multiple channels at once)

warn.warn3_mp: You've been warned from the server ${message.guild.name} for ${reason}.
warn.help_usage:
am!warn <@mention> <reason>
am!warn delete <number> <@user>
am!warn channel <#mention>
am!warn ban <number>
am!warn kick <number>

If you want it to be displayed in the level-up channel, type `msgChannel`, else please mention a channel.
